name: fetch_email_of_a_person
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool email_finder.
Tool description: Find email of anyone from their first name, last name, and domain
API description: Fetch the email address of a person based on their first name, last name, and domain using the Email Finder API.

first_name.description: The first name of the person whose email is being fetched.

domain.description: The domain associated with the email address.

last_name.description: The last name of the person whose email is being fetched.
